backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management and leaderboard score submission with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features: WASD+arrow key support for Snake and Breakout games, and updated GameControlsOverlay to display both control schemes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/TSX files including game implementations, UI components, hooks, and utilities with focus on dual WASD/arrow key control support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including sidebar, chart, and destructive color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Arcade Browser application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for catalog, play, and help pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with ProfileSetupDialog overlay.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Authentication button component managing Internet Identity login/logout flow with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter a display name, blocking dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/GameCanvas.tsx: Main game canvas component managing game lifecycle, centralized keyboard input handling with focus management, game loop integration, error handling, and UI controls for start/restart/pause.
frontend/src/components/GameControlsOver: Dialog component displaying detailed keyboard controls for each game, showing both WASD and arrow key mappings with action descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper component providing consistent structure with header, main content area with arcade background, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardPanel: React component that displays local best score and provides authenticated users the ability to submit scores to a global leaderboard, with submission state management and authentication prompts.
frontend/src/components/ScoreSummary.tsx: React component that displays current score and personal best score for a game, automatically saving new personal bests to local storage.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright year and a link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Site header with logo, title, navigation links to help page, and login button, using sticky positioning with backdrop blur.
frontend/src/data/gamesCatalog.ts: Defines game metadata interface and exports a catalog array containing metadata for three games: Snake, Pong, and Breakout, including thumbnails, descriptions, and controls.
frontend/src/games/breakout/BreakoutGame: Implements the Breakout game engine with paddle control, ball physics, brick collision detection, and scoring, following the GameEngine interface.
frontend/src/games/engine/useGameLoop.ts: Custom React hook that manages a requestAnimationFrame-based game loop with delta time calculation, providing start/stop controls and capping frame time to prevent large jumps.
frontend/src/games/pong/PongGame.ts: Implements the Pong game engine with player paddle control, AI opponent logic, ball physics, collision detection, and scoring.
frontend/src/games/snake/SnakeGame.ts: Implements the Snake game engine with grid-based movement, food placement, collision detection for walls and self, and score tracking.
frontend/src/games/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for game state and the GameEngine contract that all game implementations must follow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and game scores via the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, arcade-style utilities, and background patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of available games from the catalog with thumbnails, descriptions, and control badges, linking to individual game pages.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Help documentation page explaining browser-based gameplay, keyboard controls, score tracking, and game-specific control references.
frontend/src/pages/PlayGamePage.tsx: Game player page that renders the GameCanvas component for a specific game ID from the catalog, with navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/storage/localHighScores.ts: LocalStorage utility functions for persisting and retrieving best scores per game on the client side.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking dual control scheme implementation (WASD + arrow keys) across a multi-game arcade. Snake, Breakout, and controls overlay are complete; Pong update is pending.
